"A.P.242/3/31/11:00": "This is the inside of the Mothership...? It looks completely different."
"I'm scanning the interior now. Its structure seems to have changed considerably."
"She's got some nerve breaking into someone else's home and remodeling everything."
"In addition to the structural changes, I've pinpointing some immense readings."
"Exactly. And as if to show how little they're concerned, they're showing no indication of being on alert."
"However, Shiva's strength continues to grow even under the effects of the barrier."
"She's likely gathering her power in preparation for your fight. You should hurry there as quickly as possible."
"There are numerous Photoners stationed along the path there... Guess she's not taking any chances."
"Other ARKS have successfully entered and are coming to your aid."
"Leave the heavy lifting to them and focus on reaching the core... Good luck."
